name: Fire Infusion
effect: Enhances creatures and buildings with fire infusion, increasing offensive capabilities and applying buildup of burning status on enemies.

name: Lightning Infusion
effect: Enhances creatures and buildings with lightning infusion, increasing mobility and applying buildup of a chain lightning attack.

name: Poison Infusion
effect: Enhances creatures and buildings with poison infusion, granting them health regeneration and applying buildup of poison on enemies.

name: Ice Infusion
effect: Enhances creatures and buildings with ice infusion, making them more resistant and applying buildup of freeze on enemies.
